description.narrative: Helios Towers Plc (HT) is an independent tower company operating across five countries in Africa, including DRC, Tanzania, Ghana, Congo-Brazzaville, and South Africa. HT recently embarked on an expansion strategy to grow its current portfolio of 7,000 towers to over 12,000 by 2025. The company is looking to enter several new markets in Africa, with Senegal as the first target country.

The project is expected to increase access to quality mobile connectivity for individuals and businesses in Senegal, and potentially across a number of other countries in Sub-Saharan Africa, by promoting shared digital infrastructure through the acquisition and roll out of new towers that will be shared by mobile operators under open access and non-discriminatory basis. The project is also expected to increase competitiveness of the market for mobile connectivity by enabling technological innovation through a faster roll out of high-speed mobile internet by all operators.
